name: Temple of Apshai
overview: Temple of Apshai, the first game of the Dunjonquest series, is a dungeon crawl rpg developed and published by Automated Simulations (now Epyx) originally in 1979, then ported to DOS and Commodore 64 in 1982. It is considered one of the first graphical role-playing games for home computers, together with Ultima's precursor Akalabeth: World of Doom.
